DOC.detailed_description: The study consist 3 Periods : Period 1 : 1-week Screening Phase , Period 2 : 30-week Treatment Phase ( consist 6-week Titration Phase 24-week Maintenance Phase ) , Period 3 : 3-week Taper/Safety Follow-Up Phase .
